detailsOfAchievement: The Tender Heart Foundation Charitable Trust is a registered, non-profit Charity working in Goa and in Karnataka. We provided mid meal, 2 sets of uniform, text books, note books and education, for a better future. We provide 3 years of education and after 3 years we sent them to main stream school. Since 2009 we have sent over 1000 children to main stream school.

title: Welfare for Animals in Goa
detailsOfAchievement: Wag has three ways in which we help the stray animals of Goa Firstly the Beach Monitoring Program where we sterilize and rehome hungry beach dogs Secondly we have a Adoption Scheme where we give help to people adopting pets We have also set up a Clinic and have a full time Vet and 2 staff Thirdly we have a Cow Sanctuary where we treat injured stray cattle Here we have a Bio Gas Plant where we use cow dung from the rescued Cows We also run School educational workshops
